postCreateCommand.bootstrap: ln -s $PWD/.cobra.yaml $HOME/.cobra.yaml && if [ ! -f "go.mod" ]; then go mod init "github.com/mrsimonemms/get-iplayer-workflow"; fi && if [ ! -f "main.go" ]; then cobra-cli init && go mod tidy; fi
postCreateCommand.ensure-minikube: minikube profile list | grep dev | grep Running || minikube start -p dev

postAttachCommand.install-fission: kubectl replace -k github.com/fission/fission/crds/v1 --force && helm upgrade --atomic --cleanup-on-fail --create-namespace --install --namespace fission --repo https://fission.github.io/fission-charts --reset-values --set serviceType=NodePort,routerServiceType=NodePort --wait fission fission-all
postAttachCommand.install-keda: helm upgrade --atomic --cleanup-on-fail --create-namespace --install --namespace keda --repo https://kedacore.github.io/charts --reset-values --wait keda keda
